At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H1255>Berodachbaladan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah:<s%> for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> had been <S%H2470>sick.<s%>

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to them, and <S%H7200>showed<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H5238>precious<s%> things, the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>ointment,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures:<s%> there was <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4475>dominion,<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> them not.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen<s%> in your <S%H1004>house?<s%> And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the things that are in my <S%H1004>house<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen:<s%> there is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> that I have not <S%H7200>showed<s%> them.
And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have laid up in <S%H686>store<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> shall be <S%H3498>left,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> <S%H2896>Good<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is it not good, <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> be in my <S%H3117>days?<s%>
